# dokploy_ais (Data Source)

Fetches all AI provider configurations in the current Dokploy organization.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ais` (Attributes List) List of AI configurations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ais))

<a id="nestedatt--ais"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ais`

Read-Only:

- `api_url` (String) The API endpoint URL for the AI provider.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the AI configuration was created.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the AI configuration.
- `is_enabled` (Boolean) Whether the AI configuration is enabled.
- `model` (String) The model being used.
- `name` (String) Display name for the AI provider configuration.
- `organization_id` (String) The organization ID this AI configuration belongs to.
